title: uTester
creator: User1st
description:
An automated, easy to use accessibility regression testing tool that detects accessibility violations
• Manage the test cases over time
• Record end-user flows and user activity
• Schedule automated testing and reporting across test cases
• Easy to use dashboards
• Export compliance reports
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> 1.0 — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
